title: How to create my very own music beats with the help of my phone - Quora

response.answer_text: You can create beats using caustic on android. For iOS users, auxy is good. These apps are good for beginners but for production quality output you need a computer with digital audio workstation like Ableton Live or Logic Pro. You will also require a good quality of studio headphones or studio monitors so you can mix and master your music.
